```{r include = FALSE}
library(DataComputing)
library(ggplot2)
```
<!-- put your content after this line -->

```{r cache = TRUE}
data_site <- "http://tiny.cc/dcf/2014-Q4-Trips-History-Data-Small.rds"
Trips <- readRDS(gzcon(url(data_site)))
```

Here is my content!

1.
```{r}
ggplot(Trips, aes(x = sdate)) +
  geom_density()
```

2.
```{r}
Trips %>%
  mutate(time_of_day = lubridate::hour(sdate) + lubridate::minute(sdate) / 60) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = time_of_day)) + geom_density()
```

3.
```{r}
Trips %>%
  mutate(time_of_day = lubridate::hour(sdate) + (lubridate::minute(sdate) / 60)) %>% 
  mutate(day_of_week = lubridate::wday(sdate)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = day_of_week)) + geom_density()
```

4.
```{r}
Trips %>%
  mutate(time_of_day = lubridate::hour(sdate) + (lubridate::minute(sdate) / 60)) %>% 
  mutate(day_of_week = lubridate::wday(sdate)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = day_of_week)) + geom_density(aes(fill = client), alpha = .3) + facet_wrap(~ day_of_week)
```

5.
```{r}
Trips %>%
  mutate(time_of_day = lubridate::hour(sdate) + (lubridate::minute(sdate) / 60)) %>% 
  mutate(day_of_week = lubridate::wday(sdate)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = day_of_week)) + geom_density(aes(fill = client), alpha = .3, position = position_stack()) + facet_wrap(~ day_of_week)
```

6.
```{r}
Trips %>%
  mutate(time_of_day = lubridate::hour(sdate) + (lubridate::minute(sdate) / 60)) %>% 
  mutate(wday = ifelse(lubridate::wday(sdate) %in% c(1,7), "weekend", "weekday")) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = wday)) + geom_density(aes(fill = client), alpha = .3, position = position_stack()) + facet_wrap(~ wday)
```
